text: (he nabee!) log aapase chandrama ke (ghatane-badhane) ke vishay mein prashn karate hain? to aap kah den, isase logon ko tithiyon ke nirdhaaran tatha haî€¼ja ke samay ka gyaan hota hai aur ye koee bhalaee nahin hai ki gharon mein unake peechhe se pravesh karo, parantu bhalaee to allaah kee avagya se bachane mein hai. gharon mein unake dvaaron se aao tatha allaah se darate raho, taaki tum[1] saphal ho jao
